text.p: Finish the problem from the previous page (and from the video) by finding the least-squares parabola of the form [mathjaxinline]y = cx^2 + ax + b[/mathjaxinline] for the data points [mathjaxinline](0,1), (1,1), (2,2),[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline](3,5)[/mathjaxinline].
Enter the correct formula in the form [mathjaxinline]c*x^2 + a*x + b[/mathjaxinline], either exactly or to two decimal places. (Remember to use * for multiplication.)
